pages.text: Homepage Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 6 Slide 2 of 6 Slide 3 of 6 Slide 4 of 6 Slide 5 of 6 Slide 6 of 6 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Your Charleston Neighborhood Market, Café & Bar near Hampton Park Lillian’s is a community-centered market and eatery on Charleston’s Westside. Start your day with coffee & breakfast, swing by for seasonal lunch, brunch (Saturday & Sunday) and dinner, or meet friends on our rooftop. We also offer Charleston catering (tailgates, boat days, cocktail parties) and private events. Reserve on Resy, explore our menus, or join the Wine Club. Reservations No reservations needed for coffee or breakfast on the 1st floor.Coffee bar: 7:15 AM–3:00 PM • Breakfast: 7:30–10:45 AM For lunch, brunch, and dinner, reservations are recommended but not required—walk-ins are always welcome. Choose the cozy dining room or our upstairs terrace (weather permitting). Full bar with craft cocktails, local beer, and natural wines. Reserve Catering From tailgates and boat days to office lunches and cocktail parties, Lillian’s Catering brings Charleston flavors to you. Order platters, brunch kits, mini biscuits, tomato pies—pickup at Lillian’s (Westside, near Hampton Park). Most orders require 24 hours’ notice. Planning something bigger? We’ll build a seasonal menu tailored to your event. Order Catering Menu Explore Lillian’s menu with seasonal, Lowcountry-inspired plates, house-baked pastries, and shareable snacks. Start at our coffee bar (7:15 AM–3:00 PM) and breakfast (7:30–10:45 AM), then join us for brunch Sat–Sun (9:00 AM–3:00 PM), plus lunch and dinner with a full bar—craft cocktails, local beer, and natural wines. Happy Hour daily, 4–6 PM. Our menu rotates eight times a year—twice on either side of each season—so there’s always something new to discover. View Menus Private Events Host your next celebration at Lillian’s. Choose our first floor or upstairs dining rooms, open-air terrace, or a full buyout for rehearsal dinners, showers, birthdays, and corporate gatherings. Seasonal menus and full bar packages available. Inquire for dates, sample menus, and pricing. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Hours & Location 247 Congress St, Charleston, SC 29403 (opens in a new tab) (843) 203-6698 eatlocal@lillianschs.com Open Daily: 7:15 AM – 10:00 PM Coffee Bar: 7:15 AM – 3:00 PM (no reservations needed) Breakfast: 7:30 AM – 10:45 AM (no reservations needed)Lunch: 11:00 AM – 3:00 PM Brunch: Saturday & Sunday, 9:00 AM – 3:00 PMDinner: 5:00 PM – 9:00 PM Happy Hour (Bar): Daily, 4:00 PM – 6:00 PM Full Bar: 11:00 AM – 10:00 PM Pastries & Grab-and-Go: Available all day No reservations needed for coffee or breakfast served in our first-floor dining room in our quaint downtown Charleston neighborhood cafe. For lunch, brunch, and dinner, reservations are recommended but not required—walk-ins welcome. Terrace seating weather permitting. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Private Events BOOK AN EVENT Looking for the perfect venue to host your next private event? Look no further! We offer an exquisite setting for all your special occasions. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Wine Club Join Wine Club (opens in a new tab) Lillian’s Wine Club — Charleston’s Monthly Natural Wine Drop (Join Now) Lillian’s Wine Club is live—join anytime. Each month, pick up a hand-selected trio of natural/low-intervention wineswith tasting notes, food pairings, and fun add-ons. Local pickup in Charleston during our Monday Market near Hampton Park. It’s a great way to meet people and connect with the neighborhood—sip with fellow wine lovers, discover new producers, and explore the endless world of wine without the fuss. Members get first dibs on special allocations, pop-up tastings, and seasonal extras curated by our team. Join Wine Club How it works — enroll online in minutes. Join now We curate — three seasonal bottles, plus optional add-ons. Pick up locally — collect at Lillian’s Monday Market (Charleston, SC). Sip & learn — enjoy tasting notes, producer stories, and pairing ideas. Why join Lillian’s Wine Club? Curated in Charleston: Sommelier-selected bottles that reflect the season and our Westside neighborhood vibe. Natural & low-intervention focus: Small producers, sustainable farming, and wines with a story. Member perks: Tasting notes, pairing tips with Lillian’s menu, first dibs on special drops & events. Easy local pickup: Grab your wines during our Monthly Monday Market—meet neighbors, support local vendors. Who it’s perfect for Fans of natural wine and small producers Charleston locals who love neighborhood gatherings Curious drinkers who want an easy, guided way to explore new regions and st FAQs Is there a waitlist?No—the club is live and open. Join anytime. Do you ship?Not yet. This is a local pickup wine club in Charleston, SC. When is pickup?During our Monthly Monday Market at Lillian’s (near Hampton Park/Westside). First Monday of the month unless that is a holiday between 4-6pm. Can I skip a month?Yes—sign into your account and pause that month. Are the wines “natural”?We focus on natural/low-intervention producers: thoughtful farming, minimal cellar manipulation, and tons of character.
